resources.string: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures.
For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother\'s womb. I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made.
Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self–control.
A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
Therefore put on the full armor of God, so that when the day of evil comes, you may be able to stand your ground.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
Our Father in heaven, hallowed be your name, your kingdom come, your will be done, on earth as in heaven.
Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
But a Samaritan, as he traveled, came to where the man was; and when he saw him, he took pity on him.
I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit.
A farmer went out to sow his seed. As he was scattering the seed, some fell along the path…
Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
The Way, the Truth, and the Life
Jesus answered, I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
My son, the father said, you are always with me, and everything I have is yours.
So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.
He is not here; he has risen! Remember how he told you, while he was still with you in Galilee…
You are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden.
The Lord is faithful to all his promises and loving toward all he has made.
But the Advocate, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, will teach you all things.
Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.
For if you forgive other people when they sin against you, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.
Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away.
I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
They asked each other, Were not our hearts burning within us while he talked with us on the road…
Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed.
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
